stories.text:
Hey Everybody,

I'm working on an idea....about ideas …and the process that individual use to manage all the ideas they have.

If you got 2 spare minutes please fill out this 2 question poll for me. Thanks in advance.

http://s.alchemer.com/s3/ManagingIdeasPains

#ideamanagement #idea #innovation #BuildInPublic
stories.title: Managing your ideas is hard Tell me about it

stories.text:
We've tried to go through both LinkedIn and the AWS startup portal and have been greeted with entry level sales reps that insist that we provide exact specs of instance sizes and pricing for our needs 12 months from now.

Curious to hear from anyone who has navigated this with success. How did you do it?
